name: Pause Prison Escape
description:
This is a game where two prisoners must join together in order to escape the prison they are being held in. In order to escape the Two prisoners must us the unique time altering ability of there prison to there advantage.

Controls 

  • Arrow keys for movement
  • Space to swap characters

Extra Bit

This game was made for the GMTK 2021 game jam with the theme joined together

Also the buttons do different things on different levels

I really hope you enjoyed if you played
